items.title: MSI’s Cyborg gaming laptop with RTX 5060 GPU, translucent side panels, more is $300 off for Presidents Day
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Presidents Day sale, Walmart is offering MSI’s Cyborg gaming laptop with an RTX 5060 GPU down at $899 shipped. This is one of the mid-range models in the brand’s RTX 50-series laptop lineup that typically goes for $1,200, and it’s now seeing a $300 discount. It previously dipped to $850 during the holiday season late last year, so it’s now sitting just $50 above its all-time low. While this isn’t the lowest price we’ve tracked for this notebook, it still delivers a great value, especially with similarly specced MSI machines currently priced well above $1,200 at retailers like Best Buy and Amazon. Head below for more details.

items.title: Originally $900 Alienware 27-inch 360Hz QHD QD-OLED gaming monitor just hit a new all-time low at $500
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Presidents Day sale, Amazon is now offering Alienware’s 27-inch 360Hz QD-OLED gaming monitor for $499.99 shipped. This display originally launched at $900, but it has mostly been hovering around the $650 mark at both Amazon and Dell in recent months. Today’s deal takes a solid $150 off that usual going rate, dropping it $50 below its previous all-time low from the early Black Friday sale last year. Dell still has it listed at $600 right now, so be sure to cash in on Amazon’s offer to secure the lowest price we have tracked for it to date. Head below for more details.

items.title: Feature: Damascus markets bustle ahead of Ramadan, but rising prices strain shoppers
items.summary: DAMASCUS, Feb. 16 (Xinhua) -- As the Muslim holy month of Ramadan approaches, Damascus' popular markets are crowded with shoppers and stocked with food, spices and household goods. items.summary:
As part of the Amazon 2026 Presidents Day Sale, as well as the Walmart 2026 Presidents Day Sale, you can currently find a number of LEGO sets benefitting from up to 38% discounts, like the LEGO Technic Fast and Furious Toyota Supra MK4 at $40 shipped, beating out its Amazon pricing by $10. Instead of shelling out $60 direct from LEGO’s website, you’ve been more likely to find it down around $50 on average elsewhere, with Amazon only ever having seen it go as low as $48. Now, during this holiday event, you’re looking at a greater 33% markdown that cuts $20 off the full price tag, giving you the lowest price we have tracked, outside of the one-time $29 low we saw from Sam’s Club back during Christmas sales. Head below to learn more and check out the best Presidents Day LEGO deals from Amazon and Walmart.

items.title: EcoFlow 48-hour flash sale drops 3,072Wh DELTA 3 Ultra power station to second-lowest $1,199, more from $674
items.summary:
While we aren’t getting an official Presidents Day sale from EcoFlow, the brand is offering up to 64% savings on its lineup of power stations right now, including a 48-hour flash sale that is taking up to 61% off four units – two power station offers and two expansion battery offers. Among these flash items, you can pick up the EcoFlow DELTA 3 Ultra Portable Power Station at $1,199 shipped, beating out its Amazon pricing by $200. While it does carry a $2,499 MSRP direct from the brand, it’s been readily available around $1,399 in 2026, with Amazon having even offered a Prime exclusive drop to $1,299 through the first week of February. Now, you’re getting a larger price cut to the second-best price we have tracked, giving you $200 savings off this year’s going rate and landing $200 above the one-time all-time low that we saw during Black Friday sales. Head below to learn more and browse the full lineup of 48-hour flash deals.

items.summary:

While this mic has seen several discounts over the years, it hasn’t dropped this low in quite some time. In fact, only once before today have we seen it hit the $100 price point during a Prime Day sale, and it quickly shot back up shortly after. Today’s deal brings that rare all-time low back, making it a great time to grab one if you’ve been waiting for a notable discount.
